    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Crossroad
    Class to run a crossroad node.
    Dashboard
    Dashboard is the main Swing window for the Traffic Simulator application.
    DashboardController
    Controller coordinating the simulator and the dashboard UI.
    Entrance
    Entrance node responsible for periodically generating vehicles and sending creation/departure events to the rest of the system.
    Event
    Base event for the simulator event system.
    EventHandler
    Central TCP server that receives serialized Event objects from simulator components and enqueues them into a priority queue.
    EventType
    Event types supported by the simulator.
    Exit
    Exit node runner.
    LogicalClock
    Simple logical clock to order events by logical timestamp.
    MapModel
    Model holding the visual and traffic-related state for the dashboard.
    MapRenderer
    Swing component that renders the static map (roads and nodes) and the dynamic vehicle sprites on top.
    NodeEnum
    Enumeration representing all nodes available in the system.
    NodeType
    Node types in the system: entrances, exits and crossroads.
    PassRoad
    Thread responsible for managing vehicles passing through a road segment.
    PathEnum
    Enumeration that defines the possible paths for vehicles.
    PedestrianLight
    Simple pedestrian light controller.
    QueueStats
    Simple thread-safe statistics collector for queue sizes.
    Receiver
    Thread that receives vehicle events from other nodes using TCP socket and places them into the local queue for processing.
    RoadEnum
    Enumeration representing all roads available in the system.
    RoundRobin
    A simple round-robin turn coordinator for cooperating threads.
    Sender
    Helper utility that sends serialized Event objects over TCP to other components of the simulator.
    SignalChangeEvent
    Represents an event where a traffic signal changes state for a particular road.
    Simulator
    Simulator coordinates external node processes and collects events.
    Statistics
    Collects runtime statistics about vehicles and their trips.
    SynchronizedQueue<E>
    Simple synchronized queue for communication between threads.
    TrafficLight
    Traffic light controller for a single incoming road.
    TrafficSorter
    Distributes arriving vehicles into per-road queues for a given node.
    UiUtils
    Utility helpers for building and formatting common Swing UI elements used by the simulator dashboard.
    Vehicle
    Represents a vehicle in the simulator.
    VehicleEvent
    An event related to a Vehicle in the simulation.
    VehicleSprite
    Visual representation of a vehicle used by the Dashboard renderer.
    VehicleType
    Vehicle types supported by the simulator.
